https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/he85BGyoCi42KWtwkC2sXlqdkWQ.jpg This gripping, atmospheric documentary recounts the infamous trial, conviction and eventual acquittal of Seattle native Amanda Knox for the 2007 murder of a British exchange student in Italy. Amanda Knox
